description:
Nothing beats plastic barrels for carrying your canoe-touring pantry. They keep the bread dry and uncrushed, keep out scavenging critters and double as camp furniture.

  • External handles make short portages easier
  • Lever-lock closure forms a seal to block water, bugs and small animals. It is not bear-proof
  • 30L is 52 x 31 x 31cm with a maximum circumference of 98cm
  • 60L is 63 x 39 x 39cm with a maximum circumference of 125cm
name: Recreational Barrel Works Plastic Barrel
